summary: THIS MOD ONLY SILENCE THE Main Menu Music Theme & DOES NOT COVER THE Sound WHEN YOU STARTING A NEW GAME.
descriptionHtml:
I made this just for the people who want a "Silent" or close to a Mute main menu music theme. (on my case, i had my reasons)
& it's not anyone's obligation to use this modification just because someone provided it. Feel free not to.
[b]This mod is purely a Music file, and NO Esp[/b]


[u]Conflicts:[/u]
Anything that replaces mus_maintheme.xwm (can be found to your Skyrim's game folder [[Data/Music/Special]])

[u]Installation:[/u]
Download the file to the file section, use NMM or any mod organizer to install it from where you put the downloaded file
or
After downloading the file, Open/extract the RAR file, Open the [[Data]] then drag the [[Music]] folder your Skyrim's [[Data]] folder

[u]Uninstalling:[/u]
Delete the file      [i]mus_maintheme.xwm[/i]      from your Skyrim's [[Data/Music/Special]]
or use the mod manager you used to install this mod.
author: kubom123
